data.title: All the Way Boys! (DVD)
data.meta_description: Shop All the Way Boys! (DVD) at Target. Choose from Same Day Delivery, Drive Up or Order Pickup. Free standard shipping with $35 orders.
data.text: A lively adventure that follows the escapades of Plata (Terence Hill) and Salud (Bud Spencer), two guys who'll do anything for a buck - as long as it's dangerous! Plata and Salud's profession is flying rickety planes over the unpredictable Amazon River jungles. Their latest assignment is to ditch a plane in the jungle so the owner can collect insurance money. The plan gets complicated when the plane actually does crash, leaving our heroes stranded amidst a colony of greedy and dangerous emerald miners. Laughs and excitement abound with the Trinity boys at their best!
